short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Ad Free allows you to watch YouTube without ads or sponsored videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YTAF (YouTube Ad Free) is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your YouTube viewing experience by removing all types of ads, including static ads, video ads, and sponsored content. Enjoy uninterrupted videos without any distractions.

Features:
• Ad-Free Viewing: Automatically removes all YouTube ads, including banner ads, video ads, and promotional content.

• Seamless Integration: Works in the background to ensure a smooth and ad-free YouTube experience.

• Lightweight and Efficient: Minimal impact on browser performance, ensuring fast and efficient ad removal.

• Easy to Use: No configuration required. Simply install the extension and enjoy ad-free YouTube videos.
